attributes.action: Abolish road tax and add it to fuel like other countries.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Mr Brown, why can`t you add vehicle excise duty (road tax) on to the price of petrol / diesel and abolish it?? 
The more you drive the more you pay, no escape from road tax.
Even the man next door who has no car, only a lawn mower will pay a little tax.
It works in other eu countries, why not the uk??
It makes sense and is not rocket science, you fill your tank, then you pay excise duty.
If anyone agrees with me please sign.
Many thanks
